property.name: associatedXMLElement
property.shortdesc: The XML element associated with the Table.

property.name: storyOffset
property.shortdesc: The insertion point before the table in the story containing the table.

property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the Table within its containing object.

property.name: allPageItems
property.shortdesc: Lists all page items contained by the Table.

property.name: allGraphics
property.shortdesc: Lists all graphics contained by the Table.

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: The unique ID of the Table.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the Table &#40;a XMLElement, XmlStory, TextFrame, Text, InsertionPoint, TextStyleRange, Paragraph, TextColumn, Line, Word, Character, Story or Cell).

property.name: textVariableInstances
property.shortdesc: A collection of text variable instances.

property.name: cells
property.shortdesc: A collection of table cells.

property.name: rows
property.shortdesc: A collection of table rows.

property.name: columns
property.shortdesc: A collection of table columns.

property.name: ovals
property.shortdesc: A collection of ellipses.

property.name: splineItems
property.shortdesc: The spline items collection.

property.name: pageItems
property.shortdesc: The page items collection, which can be used to process all page items in a container &#40;such as a document, page, or group), regardless of type.

property.name: rectangles
property.shortdesc: A collection of rectangles.

property.name: graphicLines
property.shortdesc: A collection of graphic lines.

property.name: textFrames
property.shortdesc: A collection of text frames.

property.name: polygons
property.shortdesc: A collection of polygons.

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: changes
property.shortdesc: A collection of changes.

property.name: notes
property.shortdesc: A collection of notes.

property.name: groups
property.shortdesc: A collection of groups.

property.name: epstexts
property.shortdesc: EPSTexts

property.name: formFields
property.shortdesc: A collection of form fields.

property.name: buttons
property.shortdesc: A collection of buttons.

property.name: multiStateObjects
property.shortdesc: A collection of multi-state objects.

property.name: checkBoxes
property.shortdesc: A collection of checkboxes.

property.name: comboBoxes
property.shortdesc: A collection of comboboxes.

property.name: listBoxes
property.shortdesc: A collection of listboxes.

property.name: radioButtons
property.shortdesc: A collection of radio buttons.

property.name: textBoxes
property.shortdesc: A collection of text boxes.

property.name: signatureFields
property.shortdesc: A collection of signature fields.

property.name: hiddenTexts
property.shortdesc: A collection of hidden text objects.

property.name: headerRowCount
property.shortdesc: The number of header rows.

property.name: footerRowCount
property.shortdesc: The number of footer rows.

property.name: height
property.shortdesc: The height of the Table. For a table or column, specifies the sum of the row heights.

property.name: width
property.shortdesc: The width of the Table. For a table or row, specifies the sum of the column widths.

property.name: topBorderStrokeWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight of the table's top border stroke.

property.name: topBorderStrokeType
property.shortdesc: The stroke type of the top border. Can also accept: String.

property.name: topBorderStrokeColor
property.shortdesc: The color, specified as a swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), of the table's top border stroke.

property.name: topBorderStrokeTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the table's top border stroke. (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: topBorderStrokeOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the top border strokes will overprint.

property.name: topBorderStrokeGapColor
property.shortdesc: The gap color, specified as a swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), of the table's top border stroke. Note: Valid only when top border stroke type is not solid.

property.name: topBorderStrokeGapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the gap color of the table's top border stroke. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid only when top border stroke type is not solid.

property.name: topBorderStrokeGapOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the gap of the top border stroke will overprint. Note: Valid only when top border stroke type is not solid.

property.name: leftBorderStrokeWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight of the left border stroke.

property.name: leftBorderStrokeType
property.shortdesc: The stroke type of the left border. Can also accept: String.

property.name: leftBorderStrokeColor
property.shortdesc: The color, specified as a swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), of the left border stroke.

property.name: leftBorderStrokeTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the left border stroke. (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: leftBorderStrokeOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the left border stroke will overprint.

property.name: leftBorderStrokeGapColor
property.shortdesc: The gap color, specified as a swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), of the left border stroke. Note: Valid only when left border stroke type is not solid.

property.name: leftBorderStrokeGapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the gap color of the left border stroke. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid only when left border stroke type is not solid.

property.name: leftBorderStrokeGapOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the gap of the left border stroke will overprint. Note: Valid only when left border stroke type is not solid.

property.name: bottomBorderStrokeWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight of the bottom border stroke.

property.name: bottomBorderStrokeType
property.shortdesc: The stroke type of the bottom border. Can also accept: String.

property.name: bottomBorderStrokeColor
property.shortdesc: The color, specified as a swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), of the bottom border stroke.

property.name: bottomBorderStrokeTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the bottom border stroke. (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: bottomBorderStrokeOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the bottom border stroke will overprint.

property.name: bottomBorderStrokeGapColor
property.shortdesc: The gap color, specified as a swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), of the bottom border stroke. Note: Valid only when bottom border stroke type is not solid.

property.name: bottomBorderStrokeGapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the gap color of the bottom border stroke. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid only when bottom border stroke type is not solid.

property.name: bottomBorderStrokeGapOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the gap of the bottom border stroke will overprint. Note: Valid only when bottom border stroke type is not solid.

property.name: rightBorderStrokeWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight of the right border stroke.

property.name: rightBorderStrokeType
property.shortdesc: The stroke type of the right border. Can also accept: String.

property.name: rightBorderStrokeColor
property.shortdesc: The color, specified as a swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), of the right border stroke.

property.name: rightBorderStrokeTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the right border stroke. (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: rightBorderStrokeOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the right border stroke will overprint.

property.name: rightBorderStrokeGapColor
property.shortdesc: The gap color, specified as a swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), of the right border stroke. Note: Valid only when right border stroke type is not solid.

property.name: rightBorderStrokeGapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the gap color of the right border stroke. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid only when right border stroke type is not solid.

property.name: rightBorderStrokeGapOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the gap color of the right border stroke will overprint. Note: Valid only when right border stroke type is not solid.

property.name: spaceBefore
property.shortdesc: The space above the table.

property.name: spaceAfter
property.shortdesc: The space below the table.

property.name: skipFirstAlternatingStrokeRows
property.shortdesc: The number of body rows at the beginning of the table in which to skip border stroke formatting. Note: Valid when start row stroke count is 1 or greater and/or end row stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: skipLastAlternatingStrokeRows
property.shortdesc: The number of body rows at the end of the table in which to skip border stroke formatting. Note: Valid when start row stroke count is 1 or greater and/or end row stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: startRowStrokeCount
property.shortdesc: The number of rows in the first alternating row strokes group.

property.name: startRowStrokeColor
property.shortdesc: The color, specified as a swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), of row borders in the first alternating row strokes group. Note: Valid when start row stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: startRowStrokeWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight of row borders in the first alternating row strokes group. Note: Valid when start row stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: startRowStrokeType
property.shortdesc: The stroke type of rows in the first alternating strokes group. Can also accept: String.

property.name: startRowStrokeTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the borders in the first alternating row strokes group. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when start row stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: startRowStrokeGapOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the gap color of the row border stroke in the first alternating row strokes group will overprint. Note: Valid when start row stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: startRowStrokeGapColor
property.shortdesc: The stroke gap color of row borders in the first alternating row strokes group, specified as a swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink). Note: Valid when start row stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: startRowStrokeGapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the gap color of row borders in the first alternating rows group. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when start row stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: startRowStrokeOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the row borders in the first alternating row strokes group will overprint. Note: Valid when start row stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: endRowStrokeCount
property.shortdesc: The number of rows in the second alternating row strokes group.

property.name: endRowStrokeColor
property.shortdesc: The stroke color, specified as a swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), of row borders in the second alternating row strokes group. Note: Valid when end row stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: endRowStrokeWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight of row borders in the second alternating row strokes group. Note: Valid when end row stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: endRowStrokeType
property.shortdesc: The stroke type of rows in the second alternating strokes group. Can also accept: String.

property.name: endRowStrokeTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the row borders in the second alternating strokes group. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when end row stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: endRowStrokeOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the rows in the second alternating rows group will overprint. Note: Valid when end row stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: endRowStrokeGapColor
property.shortdesc: The gap color, specified as a swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), of row borders in the second alternating rows group. Note: Valid when end row stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: endRowStrokeGapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the gap color of rows in the second alternating strokes group. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when end row stroke count is 1 or greater and end row stroke type is not solid.

property.name: endRowStrokeGapOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the gap of the row borders in the second alternating rows group will overprint. Note: Valid when end row stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: skipFirstAlternatingStrokeColumns
property.shortdesc: The number of columns on the left of the table in which to skip border stroke formatting. Note: Valid when start column stroke count is 1 or greater and/or end column stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: skipLastAlternatingStrokeColumns
property.shortdesc: The number of columns on the right side of the table in which to skip border stroke formatting. Note: Valid when start column stroke count is 1 or greater and/or end column stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: startColumnStrokeCount
property.shortdesc: The number of columns in the first alternating column strokes group.

property.name: startColumnStrokeColor
property.shortdesc: The stroke color, specified as a swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), of column borders in the first alternating column strokes group.

property.name: startColumnStrokeWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight of column borders in the first alternating column strokes group. Note: Valid when start column stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: startColumnStrokeType
property.shortdesc: The stroke type of columns in the first alternating strokes group. Can also accept: String.

property.name: startColumnStrokeTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of column borders in the first alternating column strokes group. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when start column stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: startColumnStrokeOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the column borders in the first alternating column strokes group will overprint. Note: Valid when start column stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: startColumnStrokeGapColor
property.shortdesc: The stroke gap color, specified as a swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), of column borders in the first alternating column strokes group. Note: Valid when start column stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: startColumnStrokeGapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the gap color of column borders in the first alternating column strokes group. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when start column stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: startColumnStrokeGapOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the gap of the column borders in the first alternating column strokes group will overprint. Note: Valid when start column stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: endColumnStrokeCount
property.shortdesc: The number of columns in the second alternating column strokes group.

property.name: endColumnStrokeColor
property.shortdesc: The stroke color, specified as a swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), of column borders in the second alternating column strokes group. Note: Valid when end column stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: endColumnStrokeWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight of column borders in the second alternating column strokes group. Note: Valid when end column stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: endColumnLineStyle
property.shortdesc: The stroke type of columns in the second alternating strokes group. Can also accept: String.

property.name: endColumnStrokeTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of column borders in the second alternating column strokes group. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when end column stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: endColumnStrokeOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the column borders in the second alternating column strokes group will overprint. Note: Valid when end column stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: endColumnStrokeGapColor
property.shortdesc: The stroke gap color, specified as a swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), of column borders in the second alternating column strokes group. Note: Valid when end column stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: endColumnStrokeGapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the gap color of column borders in the second alternating column strokes group. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when end column stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: endColumnStrokeGapOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the gap of the column border stroke in the second alternating column strokes group will overprint. Note: Valid when end column stroke count is 1 or greater.

property.name: columnFillsPriority
property.shortdesc: If true, hides alternating row fills. If false, hides alternating column fills.

property.name: skipFirstAlternatingFillRows
property.shortdesc: The number of body rows at the beginning of the table to skip before applying the row fill color. Note: Valid when alternating fills are defined for table rows.

property.name: skipLastAlternatingFillRows
property.shortdesc: The number of body rows at the end of the table in which to not apply the row fill color. Note: Valid when alternating fills are defined for table rows.

property.name: startRowFillColor
property.shortdesc: The fill color, specified as a swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), of rows in the first alternating fills group. Note: Valid when alternating fills are defined for table rows.

property.name: startRowFillCount
property.shortdesc: The number of rows in the first alternating fills group. Note: Valid when alternating fills are defined for table rows.

property.name: startRowFillTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the rows in the first alternating fills group. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when alternating fills are defined for table rows.

property.name: startRowFillOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the rows in the first alternating fills group will overprint. Note: Valid when alternating fills are defined for table rows.

property.name: endRowFillCount
property.shortdesc: The number of rows in the second alternating fills group. Note: Valid when alternating fills are defined for table rows.

property.name: endRowFillColor
property.shortdesc: The fill color, specified as a swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), of rows in the second alternating fills group. Note: Valid when alternating fills are defined for table rows.

property.name: endRowFillTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the rows in the second alternating fills group. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when alternating fills are defined for table rows.

property.name: endRowFillOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the rows in the second alternating fills group will overprint. Note: Valid when alternating fills are defined for table rows.

property.name: skipFirstAlternatingFillColumns
property.shortdesc: The number of columns on the left side of the table to skip before applying the column fill color. Note: Valid when alternating fills are defined for table columns.

property.name: skipLastAlternatingFillColumns
property.shortdesc: The number columns on the right side of the table in which to not apply the column fill color. Note: Valid when alternating fills are defined for table columns.

property.name: startColumnFillCount
property.shortdesc: The number of columns in the first alternating fills group. Note: Valid when alternating fills are defined for table columns.

property.name: startColumnFillColor
property.shortdesc: The fill color, specified as a swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), of columns in the first alternating fills group. Note: Valid when alternating fills are defined for table columns.

property.name: startColumnFillTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the columns in the first alternating fills group. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when alternating fills are defined for table columns.

property.name: startColumnFillOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the columns in the first alternating fills group will overprint. Note: Valid when alternating fills are defined for table columns.

property.name: endColumnFillCount
property.shortdesc: The number of columns in the second alternating fills group. Note: Valid when alternating fills are defined for table columns.

property.name: endColumnFillColor
property.shortdesc: The fill color, specified as a swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), of columns in the second alternating fill group. Note: Valid when alternating fills are defined for table columns.

property.name: endColumnFillTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the columns in the second alternating fills group. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when alternating fills are defined for table columns.

property.name: endColumnFillOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the columns in the second alternating fills group will overprint. Note: Valid when alternating fills are defined for table columns.

property.name: breakHeaders
property.shortdesc: The header placement.

property.name: breakFooters
property.shortdesc: The footer placement.

property.name: skipFirstHeader
property.shortdesc: If true, skips the first occurrence of header rows.

property.name: skipLastFooter
property.shortdesc: If true, skips the last occurrence of footer rows.

property.name: strokeOrder
property.shortdesc: The order in which to display row and column strokes at corners.

property.name: alternatingFills
property.shortdesc: The pattern for alternating fills.

property.name: contents
property.shortdesc: The contents to place in cells, specified as an array whose first item populates the top left cell and whose second item populates the next cell to the right, and so on until each cell in the top row is populated, at which point the next item populates the left-most cell in the second row, and so on. Note: If the array contains fewer strings than the table contains cells, the remaining cells are left blank. Can return: Array of Strings or SpecialCharacters enumerators. Can also accept: Array of Strings, SpecialCharacters enumerators or NothingEnum enumerators.

property.name: label
property.shortdesc: A property that can be set to any string.

property.name: bodyRowCount
property.shortdesc: The number of body rows.

property.name: columnCount
property.shortdesc: The number of columns.

property.name: name
property.shortdesc: The name of the Table; this is an alias to the Table's label property.

property.name: appliedTableStyle
property.shortdesc: The table style applied to the table. Can also accept: String.

property.name: tableDirection
property.shortdesc: The direction of the the table

property.name: displayCollapsed
property.shortdesc: If true, then the table will show collapsed in story and galley views.

property.name: displayOrder
property.shortdesc: Specifies the order the table cells will display in when viewing in story and galley views.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: autoTag
method.shortdesc: Tag the object or the parent story using default tags defined in XML preference.

method.name: markup
method.shortdesc: Associates the page item with the specified XML element while preserving existing content.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The XML element.

method.name: recompose
method.shortdesc: Recomposes the text in the Table.

method.name: findText
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: changeText
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value and replaces the text with the change to value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: findGrep
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: changeGrep
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value and replaces the text with the change to value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: findGlyph
method.shortdesc: Finds glyphs that match the find what value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: changeGlyph
method.shortdesc: Finds glyphs that match the find what value and replaces the glyphs with the change to value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: findTransliterate
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find character type value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: changeTransliterate
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find character type value and replaces the text with the change character type value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: remove
method.shortdesc: Deletes the Table.

method.name: unmerge
method.shortdesc: Unmerges all merged cells in the Table.

method.name: convertToText
method.shortdesc: Converts the table to text.

parameter.name: columnSeparator
parameter.shortdesc: The character to insert between the each column's content in the converted text. Note: Can be defined as any single character, such as a letter, number, or punctuation mark, or by typing a space or tab. Use the actual character rather than its name, such as ',' rather than 'Comma'. Precede double or single quotes or a backslash with an extra backslash as an escape character. For paragraphs, use ^p. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: rowSeparator
parameter.shortdesc: The character to use to separate each row's content in the converted text. Note: Can be defined as any single character, such as a letter, number, or punctuation mark, or by typing a space or tab. Use the actual character rather than its name, such as , rather than Comma. Precede double or single quotes or a backslash with an extra backslash as an escape character. For paragraphs, use ^p. &#40;Optional)

method.name: insertLabel
method.shortdesc: Sets the label to the value associated with the specified key.

parameter.name: key
parameter.shortdesc: The key.

parameter.name: value
parameter.shortdesc: The value.

method.name: extractLabel
method.shortdesc: Gets the label value associated with the specified key.

parameter.name: key
parameter.shortdesc: The key.

method.name: clearTableStyleOverrides
method.shortdesc: Clear Table Style Overrides

method.name: convertBulletsAndNumberingToText
method.shortdesc: Convert bullets and numbering to text.

method.name: select
method.shortdesc: Selects the object.

parameter.name: existingSelection
parameter.shortdesc: The selection status of the Table in relation to previously selected objects. &#40;Optional)

method.name: createOutlines
method.shortdesc: Converts text to outlines. Each line of text becomes a polygon object. When the converted text is a single letter that has no internal spaces or detached parts, the polygon contains only a single path. Note: To determine whether a font allows the creation of outlines, see allow outlines.

parameter.name: deleteOriginal
parameter.shortdesc: If true, deletes the original text. If false, creates the outlines as separate object&#40;s) on top of the text.  (Optional)

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Table.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

method.name: toSpecifier
method.shortdesc: Retrieves the object specifier.

method.name: addEventListener
method.shortdesc: Adds an event listener.

parameter.name: eventType
parameter.shortdesc: The event type.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: captures
parameter.shortdesc: This parameter is obsolete. &#40;Optional)

method.name: removeEventListener
method.shortdesc: Removes the event listener.

parameter.name: eventType
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event type.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: captures
parameter.shortdesc: This parameter is obsolete. &#40;Optional)
